K12D0482_H0450:79a-10: de nyid la phyag rgya'i snying po 'di 'bum bzlas te bsgrub bo //
K12D0482_H0450:79a-12: rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis su byas te /
K12D0482_H0450:79a-13: g-yas pas mtshan ma ji ltar byas pa bzhin du gzung ngo //
K12D0482_H0450:79a-14: ma rnams thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni
K12D0482_H0450:79a-15: 'di bzhin du rdo rje'i khu tshur las g-yon pa
K12D0482_H0450:79a-16: rdo rje'i khro bo'i mdzub mo bsgreng ba ste /
K12D0482_H0450:79a-18: tshogs kyi gnas su rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mos
K12D0482_H0450:79a-19: mi khrag thigs pa gsum khar blangs te myangs nas
K12D0482_H0450:79a-20: mi ro ma smas shing ma nyams pa rkang pa
K12D0482_H0450:79a-21: g-yon pas mnan te brgya bzlas na nam mkha' la
K12D0482_H0450:79a-22: 'gro ba dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12D0482_H0450:79a-23: byad ma thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro /
K12D0482_H0450:79a-24: tshogs de dag thams cad kyi dbang por 'gyur ro //
K12D0482_H0450:79a-27: mkha' 'gro ma'i bde ba'i mchog thams cad dang /
K12D0482_H0450:79a-30: phyag rgya thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0482_H0450:79b-0: de nas khro bo'i khu tshur sgrub pa'i snying po ni @79b 'di yin no //
K12D0482_H0450:79b-2: phyag rgya bcing ba'i bar du'o /
K12D0482_H0450:79b-3: de nas de'i rjes la phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba'i sgrub pa'i skabs bshad par bya ste /
K12D0482_H0450:79b-4: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya gsang ba sgrub pa ni dkyil 'khor bri ste /
K12D0482_H0450:79b-6: bcom ldan phyag rgya btsun mo 'di //
K12D0482_H0450:79b-7: rtag tu bdag la stsal bar stsol //
K12D0482_H0450:79b-8: sems can kun gyi don sgrub phyir /
K12D0482_H0450:79b-9: grub pa'i mchog ni bsgrub par bgyi /
K12D0482_H0450:79b-10: phyag na rdo rje dkyil 'khor nas 'di zhes brjod do //
K12D0482_H0450:79b-11: su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho //
K12D0482_H0450:79b-12: badzar satva a'a dya si ddha nan //
K12D0482_H0450:79b-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya sgrub pa ni /
K12D0482_H0450:79b-14: byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che //
K12D0482_H0450:79b-15: rtag tu bdag la grub pa stsol //
K12D0482_H0450:79b-16: de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje rigs kyi gsang
K12D0482_H0450:79b-17: ba sgrub pa ni phyag na rdo rje khro bo
K12D0482_H0450:79b-18: ni thams cad byed pa yin no zhes de skad
K12D0482_H0450:79b-20: ma rnams kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya sgrub pa ni
K12D0482_H0450:79b-21: dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas bhyo bhyo zhes brjod cig
K12D0482_H0450:79b-22: gsang ba bsgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba'o //
K12D0482_H0450:79b-23: de nas phyag rgya'i de kho na 'byung ste /
K12D0482_H0450:79b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'i de kho na ni sems las sang rgyas kyi chos 'byung ngo //
K12D0482_H0450:79b-25: yang dag par na 'di dag ste /
K12D0482_H0450:79b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo'i thugs la gnas pa yin no //
K12D0482_H0450:79b-27: bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yin pas bdag gi chung ma yin pas /
K12D0482_H0450:80a-1: gi chung ma yin no zhes sngar bsgoms la phyag rgya bsgrub bo //
K12D0482_H0450:80a-2: phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i de kho na ni //
K12D0482_H0450:80a-3: rab dga' bcing ba kun gyi mchog //
K12D0482_H0450:80a-4: de las phyag rgya rnams su byas /
K12D0482_H0450:80a-5: 'dod pa rdo rje sems dpa' yis //
K12D0482_H0450:80a-6: grub brtan myur du stsol bar mdzad //
K12D0482_H0450:80a-8: bcom ldan rtag pa 'dod pa ste //
K12D0482_H0450:80a-9: de dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'o //
K12D0482_H0450:80a-10: de las thams cad bdag nyid gzugs //
K12D0482_H0450:80a-11: bdag kyang phyag rgya grub par shog //
K12D0482_H0450:80a-12: de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag
K12D0482_H0450:80a-13: rgya'i de kho na ni phyag na rdo rje lha
K12D0482_H0450:80a-14: thams cad dbang du byas nas rdo rjer byas te
K12D0482_H0450:80a-15: / de dag gi phyag rgya yang rdo rje'i phyag rgya nyid do //
K12D0482_H0450:80a-16: de nas ma rnams kyi phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid ni /
K12D0482_H0450:80a-17: ma rung thams cad za ba'i phyir /
K12D0482_H0450:80a-18: lha rnams kun gyis byas pa ste /
K12D0482_H0450:80a-19: phyag rgya 'bebs pas de yi phyir /
K12D0482_H0450:80a-20: bsgoms nas kyang ni bsgrub par bya /
K12D0482_H0450:80a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de kho na rab tu sbyor bas thog mar bsgoms nas bsgrub bo //
K12D0482_H0450:80a-22: phyag rgya'i de kho na'i rab tu bya ba'o //
K12D0482_H0450:80a-23: de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlab
K12D0482_H0450:80a-24: pa la sogs pa'i las bshad do zhes nas bcom
K12D0482_H0450:80a-25: ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa /
K12D0482_H0450:80a-26: nyin re dang po dus bzhin du //
K12D0482_H0450:80a-27: rdo rje chen mchog phyag rgya yis /
K12D0482_H0450:80a-28: snying kha smin mtshams lkog ma gtsug /
K12D0482_H0450:80a-29: bdag nyid byin gyis brlab par bya /
K12D0482_H0450:80b-0: de la byin @80b gyis brlab pa'i snying po ni 'di yin no //
K12D0482_H0450:80b-5: de la 'di ni rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i snying po yin no //
K12D0482_H0450:80b-6: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi shinytsa snying
K12D0482_H0450:80b-7: po 'dis rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya smin
K12D0482_H0450:80b-9: mdzub mo gnyis kyis phreng ba'i tshul du bcings la /
K12D0482_H0450:80b-10: ltag par mdud pa'i tshul du byas te bskor te /
K12D0482_H0450:80b-11: mthe'u chung nas brtsams te dkrol bas sor mo thams cad bkrol te dar dbyangs pa ltar bya'o //
K12D0482_H0450:80b-12: de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes bskyod pa
K12D0482_H0450:80b-13: ni rdo rje bcing pa bkan te pang par bzhag
K12D0482_H0450:80b-14: nas bsgom pa'i snying po 'dis rang gi snying gar
K12D0482_H0450:80b-17: rdo rje'i bzlas pas ci 'dod pa bzlas so //
K12D0482_H0450:80b-18: de nas rdo rje'i mchod pa'i rab tu bya ba ni //
K12D0482_H0450:80b-19: rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis bcangs nas //
K12D0482_H0450:80b-20: rdo rje 'gying ba legs par bya /
K12D0482_H0450:80b-21: rdo rje phreng ba de bzhin glu //
K12D0482_H0450:80b-22: rdo rje gar kyang spyi bo nas //
K12D0482_H0450:80b-23: der bstod pa'i rdo rje'i glu blang zhing mchod par bya'o //
K12D0482_H0450:80b-24: rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa'o //
K12D0482_H0450:80b-25: rdo rje rin chen bla med de /
K12D0482_H0450:80b-26: rdo rje chos ni glur blangs pas /
K12D0482_H0450:80b-27: rdo rje las ni mdzad par gsol /
K12D0482_H0450:80b-30: glu dang mchod pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
K12D0482_H0450:80b-31: kyang rnyed par mi dka' na grub pa gzhan lta
K12D0482_H0450:80b-32: ci smos / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K12D0482_H0450:80b-33: de ltar sems dpa'i bde ba 'di dang mtshungs pa med do //
K12D0482_H0450:81a-0: @81a *// de nas phyag na rdo rje sa'i byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa 'byung ste /
K12D0482_H0450:81a-1: nyin re dang por dus bzhin du //
K12D0482_H0450:81a-2: rdo rje'i byin gyis brlab tshul gyis //
K12D0482_H0450:81a-3: bdag gis bdag nyid byin brlabs nas //
K12D0482_H0450:81a-4: sems dpar byin rlabs rnal 'byor ldan //
K12D0482_H0450:81a-5: rdo rje dang bcas rdo rje bcing //
K12D0482_H0450:81a-6: rdo rje 'bebs la sogs tshul gyis //
K12D0482_H0450:81a-7: rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje bcas //
K12D0482_H0450:81a-8: gnyis byas phyag rgya'i mchog gis su //
K12D0482_H0450:81a-9: bdag nyid byin gyis brlab par bya //
K12D0482_H0450:81a-10: 'dod pa bdag nyid ces kyang bsgom //
K12D0482_H0450:81a-11: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i snying po bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0482_H0450:81a-12: de la gsang ba'i snying po 'di rdo rje'i glus ci 'dod pa bzlas so //
K12D0482_H0450:81a-14: de nas bsgrub pa gzhan yang rdo rje bcing bas
K12D0482_H0450:81a-15: rtags bzung ste 'bum bzlas na 'dod pa thams cad
K12D0482_H0450:81a-20: kun du 'gro ba thams cad grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0482_H0450:81a-21: de nas phyag na rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i rab
K12D0482_H0450:81a-22: tu bya ba 'byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa
K12D0482_H0450:81a-23: thams cad kyi phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba ji lta
K12D0482_H0450:81a-24: ba bzhin du snying po 'dis sbyin no //
K12D0482_H0450:81a-25: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ratna aa bhi she ka aa /
K12D0482_H0450:81a-26: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye
K12D0482_H0450:81a-27: shes bskyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa ni
K12D0482_H0450:81b-0: ji ltar bcom @81b ldan 'das sems can thams cad
K12D0482_H0450:81b-1: nyid yin pa de bzhin du bdag kyang thams cad
K12D0482_H0450:81b-2: nyid do zhes nas snying po 'dis thams cad dgug
K12D0482_H0450:81b-5: dbang du byas te bsgom mo //
K12D0482_H0450:81b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gsang ba'i
K12D0482_H0450:81b-9: mchod pa bya ba ni byin gyis brlab pa la
K12D0482_H0450:81b-10: sogs pa thams cad byed de /
K12D0482_H0450:81b-11: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcangs la //
K12D0482_H0450:81b-12: rdo rje gar dang sbyar nas su //
K12D0482_H0450:81b-13: me tog la sogs pa dbul ba ni //
K12D0482_H0450:81b-14: gsang ba'i mchod pa phyag rgyas dbul //
K12D0482_H0450:81b-15: gzhu 'dren pa yi tshul gyis su //
K12D0482_H0450:81b-16: rdo rje mda' ni 'phen par bya //
K12D0482_H0450:81b-17: kun nas 'khyud dang rgyal mtshan bsgreng //
K12D0482_H0450:81b-19: rdo rje'i bstod pa 'dis rdo rje'i glu glang zhing mchod do //
K12D0482_H0450:81b-20: gzugs la sogs pa 'dod pa dag gi bde ba dang //
K12D0482_H0450:81b-21: shin tu yid bde bcom ldan rab dga' khyod la 'dud //
K12D0482_H0450:81b-22: khyod kyis bdag la deng du dga' bde kun mchod la //
K12D0482_H0450:81b-23: mchog gi bdag nyid grub pa'ang myur du tshul bzhin stsol //
K12D0482_H0450:81b-24: bstod pa'i snying po 'dis thams cad grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0482_H0450:81b-25: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la nyin rer
K12D0482_H0450:81b-26: lan re bstod na bcom ldan 'das las thams cad
K12D0482_H0450:81b-28: slob dpon de rang gi lce las kyang 'das pa dang /
K12D0482_H0450:81b-30: da ltar gyi thams cad dang /
K12D0482_H0450:82a-2: tshig gi rgyud thams cad kyang smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0482_H0450:82a-3: lha'i glu sngon ma byung ba yang len to //
K12D0482_H0450:82a-4: rdo rje'i glus 'bum bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0482_H0450:82a-5: de ltar lan gcig byin gyis brlabs la de nas phyis sgrubs shig /
K12D0482_H0450:82a-6: de nas nyin gcig bzhin byin gyis brlab pa la
K12D0482_H0450:82a-7: sogs pa nyin rer lan re byas na grub pa
K12D0482_H0450:82a-8: thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /
K12D0482_H0450:82a-9: dbang bskur ba la sogs pa dang /
K12D0482_H0450:82a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dang /
K12D0482_H0450:82a-13: sems dpa' rnams der lhags nas phra mo la sogs pa ston te tshig smra'o //
K12D0482_H0450:82a-16: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang /
K12D0482_H0450:82a-17: rim gro thams cad kyis mchod do //
K12D0482_H0450:82a-18: sems can thams cad la tshar gcad pa dang /
K12D0482_H0450:82a-24: sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad dang /
K12D0482_H0450:82a-26: sdug bsngal thams cad kyang sel to //
K12D0482_H0450:82b-0: bdag nyid kyis de bzhin @82b gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa sems dpa'i gzugs man chad dang /
K12D0482_H0450:82b-1: bdag gi lus thams cad dang /
K12D0482_H0450:82b-6: chu rnams las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
K12D0482_H0450:82b-7: la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad ston par byed do
K12D0482_H0450:82b-8: // 'od zer ston pa la sogs pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad ston to //
K12D0482_H0450:82b-9: rang yang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la sogs pa dang /
K12D0482_H0450:82b-10: thams cad kyi gzugs su 'gyur ro //
K12D0482_H0450:82b-13: da ltar gyi shes pa thams cad yi ge rnams las mthong ngo //
K12D0482_H0450:82b-14: thams cad las thos shing rang gi lces smra'o //
K12D0482_H0450:82b-15: sngon ma byung ba'i rtog pa dang /
K12D0482_H0450:82b-17: ston skyo ba thams cad dang /
K12D0482_H0450:82b-23: sgyu rtsal thams cad lhun gyis grub par shes par 'gyur ro //
K12D0482_H0450:82b-24: nyin gcig bzhin du gzugs chen po dang /
K12D0482_H0450:82b-30: dngos grub thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12D0482_H0450:82b-31: sems can thams cad kyi sems dang /
K12D0482_H0450:82b-35: nyin gcig bzhin thams cad mngon par shes par 'gyur ro //
K12D0482_H0450:82b-36: mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /
K12D0482_H0450:83a-1: sogs pa dngos grub thams cad ma bsgrubs par tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0482_H0450:83a-2: byin gyis brlabs la sogs pa'i rab tu bya ba'o //
K12D0482_H0450:83a-3: de la sgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba 'byung ste /
K12D0482_H0450:83a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa sgrub pa ni mdun du bdag
K12D0482_H0450:83a-5: nyid sangs rgyas kyi sku rjes su dran pa bsgom
K12D0482_H0450:83a-10: phyag na rdo rje sgrub pa ni sems dpar byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor ram /
K12D0482_H0450:83a-12: rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran pa'am /
K12D0482_H0450:83a-13: bdag gi snying gar rdo rje bsgom pa'am /
K12D0482_H0450:83a-14: bdag gi mdun du sangs rgyas rjes su dran par byed bzhin du snying po dang /
K12D0482_H0450:83a-18: sems dpa' chen po thams cad ni bdag nyid kyis rang gi sems dpa' rjes su dran pa'am /
K12D0482_H0450:83a-19: snying gar rdo rje chen po bsgom zhing snying po dang /
K12D0482_H0450:83a-22: rig pa rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
K12D0482_H0450:83a-23: phyi'i rdo rje rigs sgrub pa ni khro bo'i tshul gyi snying po dang /
K12D0482_H0450:83a-27: rdo rje ma rnams sgrub pa ni sems can thams cad za ba'i rjes su dran pa'am /
K12D0482_H0450:83a-28: bdag nyid rdo rje srin por gyur te /
K12D0482_H0450:83b-0: de'i phyir bdag nyid kyang @83b sems can thams cad bza'o zhes khros te snying po dang /
K12D0482_H0450:83b-3: rig pa rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
K12D0482_H0450:83b-4: sgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba'o //
K12D0482_H0450:83b-5: de nas sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rab tu bya ba 'byung ste //
K12D0482_H0450:83b-7: de ltar sgrub par gsungs pa ste //
K12D0482_H0450:83b-8: grub pa thams cad byed pa'i mchog /
K12D0482_H0450:83b-9: sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rab tu bya ba'o //
K12D0482_H0450:83b-10: de nas ras kyi rab tu bya ba 'byung ste /
K12D0482_H0450:83b-11: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ras ni skra med
K12D0482_H0450:83b-12: par byas la dkyil 'khor zlum por thig gdab bo
K12D0482_H0450:83b-13: // phyag na rdo rje'i ras ni ngos thams cad par gru bzhi po dar ram ras la bri'o //
K12D0482_H0450:83b-14: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ni ji lta bur 'dus pa'i 'khor bzhin du'o //
K12D0482_H0450:83b-15: phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyis ma bsdus pa la
K12D0482_H0450:83b-16: 'dus pa'i 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du dgod do
K12D0482_H0450:83b-17: // rdo rje ma rnams kyi ma nyams pa la kha tshar ma bcad pa ste /
K12D0482_H0450:83b-18: ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis sbyin med pa'i tshon rtsi snod gsar par bzhag pas bri /
K12D0482_H0450:83b-19: ras kyi rab tu bya ba'o //
K12D0482_H0450:83b-20: de la cha lugs kyi tshad rab tu bya ba
K12D0482_H0450:83b-21: ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
K12D0482_H0450:83b-22: mtho gang tsam du bya ba'o //
K12D0482_H0450:83b-23: phyag na rdo rje'i ni mtha' med pa'i phyir ji ltar 'dod pa'i tshad du bya ba'o //
K12D0482_H0450:83b-24: de la rdo rje'i tshad ni ji tsam du 'gyur zhe na /
K12D0482_H0450:84a-0: rang gi mthe bo'i tshigs kyi sor @84a *//
K12D0482_H0450:84a-2: de la rdo rje'i dbyibs ci 'dra bar bya zhe na /
K12D0482_H0450:84a-3: zur bzhi la rtse lnga pa 'od zer gyi phreng ba can sum char bya'o //
K12D0482_H0450:84a-4: sems dpa' chen po thams cad ni mthe bo'i tshigs kyi sor bcu drug gi tshad du bya ste /
K12D0482_H0450:84a-5: thams cad kyang pad mo la bzhugs par bya'o //
K12D0482_H0450:84a-6: de bzhin du sku gzugs kyi tshad las dkyil 'khor gyi tshad kyang de dang 'dra bar bya'o //
K12D0482_H0450:84a-7: de la 'di ni bzlas pa'i rab tu bya ba ste /
K12D0482_H0450:84a-8: de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ni dgongs pa'i gsung ting nge 'dzin gyi tshig ste /
K12D0482_H0450:84a-9: rdo rje rnams kyi'ang de bzhin no //
K12D0482_H0450:84a-10: de la rtog pa thams cad kyi spyir ni rdo rje'i tshig gi bzlas te sgrub bo //
